body_html:
@ElijahLai thank you for your quick response.

Did you regenerate those soft links or did you simple not have them (you added them for the first time)?

I ask because my setup already has cudnn.h in cuda-8.0/include, the lib files in cuda-8.0/lib64, and libcudnn.so and libcudnn.so.6 already exist as soft links inside cuda-8.0/lib64.

Thanks in advance!

body:
@ElijahLai thank you for your quick response. 

Did you regenerate those soft links or did you simple not have them (you added them for the first time)?

I ask because my setup already has cudnn.h in cuda-8.0/include, the lib files in cuda-8.0/lib64, and libcudnn.so and libcudnn.so.6 already exist as soft links inside cuda-8.0/lib64.

Thanks in advance!
